name: Wizard Rumble
description:
[How to play]

  • Use arrow keys to shoot magic missile.
  • Kill the ghosts and take their souls to earn score.
  • You need mana to use magic. Mana is recovered whenever you take souls or land on tower.

[Updates]

  • 2016-12-07
    • Now you can change SFX, BGM and Input invert settings with number keys on your keyboard.
    • Mac version is available! (Check this instruction if MacOS X interrupt execution of the game)

Music by CodeManu
